column_.text_:
Thick black smoke blankets the sky. Rivers of fire flow below.
Yeah, pretty much the perfect stage for a fateful showdown.

Thick black smoke blankets the sky. Rivers of fire flow below.
Yeah, pretty much the perfect stage for a fateful showdown.
Well. Here's to hoping we make it out in one piece.
Well. Here's to hoping we make it out in one piece.

There, we're moored. Red ship shouldn't see us from here. We'll hit
'em before they know what's coming.
I'm not the only one who saw that big ass fire geyser, right?
No, we all saw it. Only a primal could pull that off.
Then it's clear that's where they've taken Lyria. Prepare for take—
What now?
I believe it means the volcano is close to erupting.

How are you so calm?! Lava is not how I wanna go out! And what
about the Grandcypher!
But we have to get to Lyria...
Should we hang back for a while?
But we have to get to Lyria...
But we have to get to Lyria...

You're preachin' to the choir! 'Course I wanna go rescue her, but I
just... Agh!
Should we hang back for a while?
Should we hang back for a while?

Every second we wait is a second Lyria might not have! We can't let
this chance slip through our fingers.

(I saw how they handled Excavallion. They could be my best bet
going forward...)

(But we'll be stranded here if we lose the ship. It would all be for
nothing...)
All right. I'll take the helm and fly the ship to safety.

Once the area stabilizes, I'll come back to pick you guys up. You all
go on ahead.
Sorry for the trouble, Rolan. Sure you don't mind?
Not at all. 'Sides, since when has Mr. Fix It ever let you down?
Ah, before I go... Vyrn, do you mind showing me the catalyst?
Wait, right now? Um, sure. No problem.

There, I've activated it. Hold it near Lyria, and it should release the
lock on the collar.
And that'll give us a fightin' chance! Thanks, Fix It Dude!
Hmm...
Time to part ways for now.

Danger lurks around every corner in this place, so proceed with
caution.

Don't worry 'bout us. You just focus on keepin' the Grandcypher
safe.
Come on, everyone! We need to hurry!
I'm sorry, skyfarers. Lilith was my responsibility...
We'll share some apples when you come home, Lyria!
I let Lyria slip from my grasp once... It won't happen again!

Sorry your rescue's taking so long, Lyria. But, hey, we're on
our way!
I'm on my way, Lyria! Everything's gonna be all right!
Everyone good? I need y'all to be ready to kick some tail!

Why do I feel so... tense? It goes without saying, but do be
careful.
I can't wait to give you a big hug when this is over, Lyria.
No mistakes this time. Lyria is counting on us!

It's sooo hot. If Avia isn't keeping Lyria properly hydrated,
I'm gonna have some strong words with them!
Follow me. I can guide you safely through ash and fire.
What kind of knight am I if I can't even protect my comrades?
Fear not, Lyria... Your freedom is at hand!

Yep, won't be long now till I'm tellin' Lyria fishing stories
again!
Stay strong, Lyria. Soon, you'll be safe in my arms again.

If they're holding her behind bars, I'll rip the steel with my
bare hands!

Now that we're finally here, I'll have Lyria back in nothing
flat!
I promised to protect Lyria. I've come to fulfill that promise.

This heat is killer... Let's bust Lyria out and get the hell outta
here.
Lyria... I'll find you.
Avia are here. We need to get moving!

So that's magma, huh? Makes the desert feel downright
frosty.
Fall in, and it's goodbye world! No one's surviving that!
Hey, you guys notice anything different about Rolan?
Not really. I mean, I guess he seems kind of tired.

He's helped us outta more jams than I can count. Let's get
him somethin' nice once this is over.
I can feel it... A primal beast is nearby.
Aha! I spy a jerkface!
Stay back!
Huh?
Isn't that...
Lyria!
I will protect her.
That primal beast is kidnapping Lyria! After it!
Stop right there! Ngh! Don't let it out of your sight!
Lyria! Quick, after that thing!
It's okay, Lyria! We're right behind you!

Chase it down! We didn't come this far to watch her slip
away!
A primal beast of fire... I can't let that stop me.
Lyria! I'm not going to lose you again!
Watch your footing! We're no use to Lyria dead!

Hey, Slithers! Give Lyria back, or I'm gonna slice me some
snake ceviche!

The moment you turned your back on me was the moment
you sealed your doom.
There's no time to strategize. We're going to lose it!
For Lyria, I'd chase that serpent to the end of the skies!

Not gonna hand her over, eh? Guess we're doin' this the hard
way!
Lyria, big sister's right here!

Bold of you to challenge me to a race, amorphous one! May
the mightier beast win!
You come back here!
Return Lyria. You don't want to make enemies of us.

How'd it trap Lyria like that? Heh. Nothing a little dissection
won't answer.
Give chase!
C'mon! It's getting away!
Wrong way! Turn around!
Why is he fighting that primal beast?

Your guess is as good as mine. All I know is he's the reason
Lyria's here in the first place.
Crap, crap, crap! Volcano's gettin' ready to blow!
Oh no! The ground is sinking into the magma!

Can't do anything about it! Just run for your lives, and don't
look back!
Hngh!
That guy's really battlin' hard.

He just wants to keep Lyria away from us. Let's get to her
first!
Nooo! Say it ain't so... ALT: No... NOOO!
Shoot... We were too slow... It got away...
We finally caught up!
Stay out of this!

Fat chance, kiddo! We're the thorn in your side that won't
come out!
I'm on my way, Lyria! This catalyst is gonna fix you right up!

Wait, Vyrn! Don't go rushing in! If the catalyst gets broken,
we'll lose everything!

We need to stop it from thrashin' around! We'll tell you when
it's your turn, Vyrn!
Id, was it? I have a question for you.

Why has that primal beast imprisoned Lyria? Since you're
fighting it, I'm going to assume it wasn't acting on Church
orders.
This has nothing to do with you.
You little punk... If anything happens to her...
Stop! We're not finished with you!
Hey! Where does that worm think it's going!
I'll hunt you down.
Ugh, we were so close! C'mon, we have to chase it again!
This volcano isn't gonna blow any time soon, right?!
That primal looks quite similar to Bahamut.
Is that why it was able to imprison Lyria?
That's where we came from! Go the other way!
Why's it takin' a dip in the magma...
Yikes! It's a magma wave!
Get swallowed by that, and it'll leave more than a nasty burn!
Get to the cover of that outcropping! It's our only chance!
Oh no! You okay?!
Hide behind the rocks, and let the wave pass!

If we can time it right, we can avoid the magma by hiding
behind the rocks!
Now's our chance to close the gap!
Hnnph!
He... He cut the wave in half?

Don't know whether to be grateful or terrified... Both, I
guess.
That's our cue. Keep it up, guys!

Why is he going that far? Could he really be trying to save
Lyria?

I mean, even if he does, he'll just take her away again, and
we're back to square one.
My thoughts exactly. Can't let him do that!

It looks like they've come to an impasse. Now we can join
the fight!
Another wave is coming!
You can run, but you can't hide! Not while we're on the hunt!
Hold on, Lyria!
Why are you here? Do you even care about her?
I already told you it has nothing to do with you.
My ass...
Where's this light coming from?

It's... Lyria. I believe it's some kind of natural defense
mechanism.

What do we do now? Our attacks aren't getting through at
all!

That's the primeval god of dread for you. There's no
controlling it.

I see what happened now. Avia brought Lyria to this altar and
awakened the primal beast...

But, as a manifestation of dread, it turned right around and
did what you feared most—it abducted Lyria.
Is that the gist of it?

Hey, we might not be able to get through to the giant snake,
but I know someone who can!

Of course! The catalyst! We'll create an opening so you can
wake Lyria up!

Get ready, Vyrn! Wait for us to attack all at once, then we'll
pass the torch!
I'm always ready! Just give me the signal!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Now, Vyrn!
Here goes nothing!
Come on, Lyria... Wake up!
Waaugh!

Smashed through the wall like it was nothing! Looks like
another chase is afoot.

It's running scared because it knows the catalyst worked.
Our next encounter will be its last.

You know it! I'm going to give Lyria the wake-up call of her
life!
C'mon! It won't wait around forever!
How'd they get down there?
What the... What's goin' on here!
I call a temporary truce.

Do you realize how preposterous that sounds coming from
you?
The blue light from the lizard. Can it save Lyria?
So what if it can? You gonna rip it from our cold dead hands?

You'd have to team up with that primal beast to even stand a
chance against us!
Primal beast? Is that what you call primeval gods?

I still don't fully trust him, but I do believe he's telling the
truth about wanting to save Lyria.

Avia needs Lyria to control primals. She's the crux of their
plan.

But as long as she's trapped inside that crystal, both we and
the Church are at an impasse.
Does that sound about right?

Yeah. And let's face it. If you want to take down this god,
you'll need my help.
All right. We'll work with you for as long as our goals align.

I still don't like the idea of teaming up with this loser, but
beggars can't be choosers!

This agreement shouldn't be an issue, right, ? At least until
we pacify the primal beast!

Hate to agree with the little punk, but he's right. We've got a
bigger worm to fry!

Don't even think about sneaking off with Lyria after Scaley is
down. I've got my eye on you!
Fine, I'll join forces for now. Let's get that primal!

I know we've got unfinished business with Id, but Lyria's
safety is the only thing that matters right now.

Can't say I'm happy about it, but the truce makes sense. Time
to take down that primal!

This alliance doesn't sit well with me. But our only choices
are to unite or fall.

The enemy of my enemy yadda yadda yadda. Think later, fight
now!

Burn this into your skull, Id. Treachery will be met with
retribution.

He's not the first person I'd have picked for an ally, but this is
our only chance at saving Lyria.

Enemies, joining together to defeat a common foe... 'Tis a
necessary evil in warfare!

Hm... Doesn't seem like he's pullin' a fast one on us... I'll play
along for Lyria's sake.
So be it. But betray us, and your head is mine.

Well, then, young Id. So long as we are brothers-in-fists,
allow me to teach you about Eternal Raaaage!
Sure. A truce. Whatever. Just don't get in my way!

This arrangement changes nothing. Lyria is coming home
with us.

Chill out, people. I'll alchemize his ass if he even looks at us
funny.

There's that glow again. Means our attacks won't get
through!

Vyrn! Let's do what we did before! After we create an
opening, you use the catalyst!
Got it! I'll be ready!
Run! Don't let the magma swallow you up!
Another wave! Run! Run!
Son of a! There's magma sploshin' all over the place!
Magma is washing over the ground! Fall back!

Oh, geez! Are you okay?! Maybe the wave won't hit you if you
escape to the sides!

Those magma waves will boil you good. Better run to safety
when they come.
Almost there! I can feel it!
Catalyst is ready to go! I won't mess it up!
Can you hear us, Lyria? Come back!
It's now or never!
Come back to us, Lyria!
Darn it! Not again!

I think it's working though! The light around the primal is
gone!
Now to inflict pain.
It's stunned. Get in there, and do some damage!

It's coming out of its daze, but I'm certain we're wearing it
down.
Hah! Breaks like glass!
I think we just found its weak spot!
Those parts we got rid of grew back!
It's not like they're hard to break. Just smash 'em again!
Ngh! Its power is magnifying!

At this rate, it'll engulf the whole island in flames. We need to
extinguish this primal—and quickly.
Here comes the magma! Get to the sides!
Seriously!? That's like tryin' to avoid water in a bathtub!
Stay alert... Something is brewing!
Does it plan on unleashing that ball of fire?
You mean like... takin' us all out in a blaze of glory?

But look, its movements have slowed. We still have a chance
to stop it!
The magma's rising! Now where are we gonna stand!

That suggests volcanic activity is attuned to the beast...
Things are going from bad to worse!
Did that manage to stop it?!

Mana's still flowing out of other parts of its body! We should
split up to save time!
Hah! Only one left!
That's the last one!
The ball of fire dissipated! Catastrophe averted.
Bahamut save me, we barely stopped that ticking time bomb.
Aaaaah!

I can't believe we're still breathin' after that. Might not be as
lucky next time...
The barrier has regenerated! Everyone, you know the drill!
This is a job for Vyrn! Just give the word!
Here we go, Vyrn! We're gonna stun this brute!
Gotcha! Standing by!
One more time!
Go!
I know already!
Take this!
Nggh!
No!
It's working. Keep at it.

Thanks for the save? Tell ya what, you're forgiven for the
time you socked me.
Hmph.
This fight is almost over, we can't make a mistake.
That goes double for you, ! If we lose you, we lose Lyria too...
What do you mean?

Our captain here shares a lifelink with Lyria. Their fates are
connected.

Our captain here shares a lifelink with Lyria. Their fates are
connected.
Their lives are... linked?
Their lives are... linked?

Mother knew about the lifelink... That's why she gave a
no-kill order for your captain...

Mother knew about the lifelink... That's why she gave a
no-kill order for your captain...
Then for Lyria to be truly happy...

Having second thoughts? Maybe there's hope for you after
all.

Heh... This is it, huh? The point of no return. It's us or the
primal!
More magma! Get to safety!

Don't throw in the towel, you guys! I'm exhausted too, but
we're almost there!

We've overcome so much. This molten chamber will not be
our tomb!
Oh, you've got to be kidding me!
It's using the last of its energy to spawn another fire ball!
Then we'll use the last of our energy to stop it!
Split up! It'll be easier to stop the explosion that way!
Be careful! You don't have much real estate!
That's one mana supply cut off! Two more to go!
We've stopped another one. One left!
And that's a wrap!
Yeah! Go team!
Aaaagh!
Is everyone still with us?
I think I escaped the worst of it... I can still fight!

Get yer head outta the clouds, kid! Don't ya wanna save
Lyria?

Feeling conflicted? Seems you're actually soft under that
thorny exterior.
Hmph.
All right, here we go! The moment of truth!
Finish it, Vyrn!
Leave it to me!
We're almost ready, Vyrn! Don't miss this chance!
It's gonna work this time! Hang on, Lyria!
No guts, no glory!
Lyria...
! How is she?
Well done, everyone.
Where did you come from!
You can't do that!
Give her back to us!
Id.
Right.
Oh, what a pity. Grief and misery make fools of us all.

Here I see a troupe of puppets, flouncing about in a play with
no audience.

And your bond with the shaman? It's threadbare. Little more
than a thin line of hope.
Fear not.

Entrust me with your strings, and I shall deliver salvation
unto you all.
I know this is much too sudden for you to comprehend.
But don't struggle; embrace it.

I commend you for making it this far, against overwhelming
odds.
But fate now swings in my favor.
Can you not see your toil was futile? Salvation is at hand!

How nice of Avia's leader to come greet us herself. Saved us
the trouble of tracking you down!

My dear, I'm not looking for a fight. I've come to extol the
virtue of salvation.

Such unbelievable mana! And what's that black aura coming
off of her?

Tch! Why don't you scrap the magic tricks, and give us a fair
fight!

She's brimming with power! I'm afraid to even get close to
her!

The ordeals of our pilgrimage are nearly at an end. Your crew
is largely to thank for that.
Acknowledge my vision, and salvation shall come.

Isn't it obvious that I am shepherding all to a transcendent
future?

We don't need your phony-baloney philosophy! As skyfarers,
we put our faith in a free sky!

Very well. The time has come to pen a new chapter in this
saga.

This has been a long journey, but a fruitful one. Now to open
the gates and bask in the light of paradise.
Stop! What are you doing!
No! We'll all be...

Why must you reject salvation? Do you not see that it is the
perfect course?
You dare...
Defy me to the end?

I'd rather not harm you—that would not be in the shaman's
best interest.

I'd rather not harm you—that would not be in the shaman's
best interest.
So I ask, judge for yourself the miracle of my salvation.
That's dirty! Give it back!
Why? This has always belonged to us.

I admit I am intrigued as to how you were able to activate the
catalyst.
Although... I suppose it no longer matters at this point.
With the primals in my possession, I've won.

She knows how to make a strong cage. My powers are
useless against it.
Damn it! We didn't come this far to get put in time-out!
There is still hope left.
Rolan? You did this?
Of course he did.

And now, even Vulkan Bolla has fallen into Lilith's hands. I can't stall
any longer.

The fate of the skies calls upon the might of your crew. Will you
fight to save it?
Rolan... I'm not sure if I like where this is goin'.
Yeah. Tell us what this is all about.

Of course. But first, your injuries need tending to. Let's return to
the ship.
The time to reveal the truth has come.
